snippet.title: F.I.S.T.: Forged in Shadow Torch - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the launch trailer for F.I.S.T.: Forged In Shadow Torch, an upcoming Metroidvania action game that encourages players to explore its beautiful world, solve its challenging puzzles and platforming, and take on ferocious enemies in combat.

From TiGames and bilibili, F.I.S.T.: Forged In Shadow Torch will be released on PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5 on September 7, 2021. Its release date on PC is TBA.

#IGN #Gaming
